CREATE TABLE TOperationLog ( id VARCHAR(64) NOT NULL COMMENT '主键' ,systemCode VARCHAR(64) NOT NULL COMMENT '系统编号' ,moduleCode VARCHAR(64) NOT NULL COMMENT '模块编号' ,url VARCHAR(64) NOT NULL COMMENT '操作的URL地址' ,urlRequest TEXT COMMENT '操作的请求参数' ,urlRequestBody TEXT COMMENT '操作的请求体数据' ,urlResponse TEXT COMMENT '操作的响应信息' ,resultCode VARCHAR(64) COMMENT '操作的响应结果编号' ,userID VARCHAR(64) NOT NULL COMMENT '操作人ID' ,userIP VARCHAR(64) NOT NULL COMMENT '操作人IP地址' ,requestTime BIGINT NOT NULL COMMENT '请求时间' ,responseTime BIGINT COMMENT '响应时间' ,timeLen BIGINT COMMENT '操作时长（单位：毫秒）' ,createTime DATETIME COMMENT '数据库的创建时间' ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4;/
ALTER TABLE TOperationLog ADD CONSTRAINT PK_OperationLog PRIMARY KEY (id);/ CREATE INDEX IDX_TOperationLog_Url USING BTREE ON TOperationLog (systemCode ,moduleCode ,url);/ CREATE INDEX IDX_TOperationLog_ResultCode USING BTREE ON TOperationLog (resultCode);/ CREATE INDEX IDX_TOperationLog_CreateTime USING BTREE ON TOperationLog (createTime);/
Alter TABLE TOperationLog COMMENT = '系统操作日志';/
